Trigger.name: Hungry/Thirsty Tic Timer
Trigger.script: if tic_timer.configs.on then raiseEvent("tic", true, tic_timer.configs.tic_is_early, tic_timer.configs.tic_is_late) end

regexCodeList.string: You are hungry.
You are thirsty.

Trigger.name: Turn off hungry/thirsty tic timer
Trigger.script: disableTrigger("Hungry/Thirsty Tic Timer") enableTrigger("Turn on hungry/thirsty tic timer") disableTrigger("Turn off hungry/thirsty tic timer")

regexCodeList.string: You have played (\d+) days and (\d+) hours \(real time\)\.$

Trigger.name: Turn on hungry/thirsty tic timer
Trigger.script: enableTrigger("Hungry/Thirsty Tic Timer") enableTrigger("Turn off hungry/thirsty tic timer") disableTrigger("Turn on hungry/thirsty tic timer")
